web.gui.secretary

Class LoginPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • web.gui.secretary.LoginPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class LoginPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    For user (secretary) log in to system by providing user name and password.
    Check the user has to be a secretary in order to log in successfully.
    Author:
    maint
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      create action for button "Log in".
      Check text fields of user name and password are valid or not?
      If Log in fail -> display warning message to ask re-type user name and/or password.
      In case user-name and password fields: one of two, or both are empty one of two, or both are invalid both are valid but user's not existing both are valid and user's existing, but user is not a secretary ( UserType.SECRETARY ).
      If log in success -> change to welcome page EmptyPage.

      • buildGUI

      • initComponents

      • doLogin

        public void doLogin()
        create action for button "Log in".
        Check text fields of user name and password are valid or not?
        If Log in fail -> display warning message to ask re-type user name and/or password.
        In case user-name and password fields:
      • one of two, or both are empty
      • one of two, or both are invalid
      • both are valid but user's not existing
      • both are valid and user's existing, but user is not a secretary ( UserType.SECRETARY ).
        If log in success -> change to welcome page EmptyPage.
